channel.title: Schmexi Interpreter

item.title: Schmexi Interpreter
item.dc:creator: @Schmexi Schmexi
item.description:
@Schmexi wrote:

I know it’s pointless, that’s the beauty of SCAR.
It’s kind of like a new programming language, I guess. I think I’ve made it rather easy to add new commands to, it currently has 3. The script reads a text file line by line like a script, and runs accordingly. It’s easy to crash the script, but oh well. I’ve also attached an example script. Set your text file path up the top, some feedback would be nice. 

// So far there are three commands:

//    _ MoveM - Just like MoveMouse
//            Usage: MoveM x,y
//               eg: MoveM 145,608

//    _ Wait  - Just like Wait
//            Usage: Wait i
//               eg: Wait 5000

//    _ Print - Just like Writeln
//            Usage: Print s
//               eg: Print This is my sTrInG! :)

//  To add new commands, create a procedure in this section, such
//  as Procedure Command_GetColour(s: String). "s" contains the parameters
//  that are passed from the text file, so you can split them up as needed
//  in the procedure you make. Then shove a quick line in the Compute
//  function and you're done.

//  Made by Schmexi. <3

Read full topic
